Articles.Content:
Hi,

mirror symmetry completely fail to achieve its goal with compound parts in the VAB:

![RCTNfF9.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RCTNfF9.jpg)

(strut connectors suffer the same issue)

it's work with both symmetry modes in SPH.

(EDIT: KSP 0.90.0.705)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T14:13:54Z" title="03/31/2015 02:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by Justin Kerbice**

Nope, it works perfectly fine *if your craft is in the VAB the right way*, you've rotated it 90Ã‚Âº and that's why it's not working as you'd expect.

Just pick up your Mk1 inline cockpit and press the space bar, then fit fuel lines in radial mode ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
